verses.verse: Now in the first <S%H259><s%> year <S%H8141><s%> of Cyrus <S%H3566><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Persia <S%H6539><s%>, that the word <S%H1697><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%> by the mouth <S%H6310><s%> of Yirmeyah-yahu <S%H3414><s%> might be fulfilled <S%H3615><s%> <S%H8800><s%>, the YY <S%H3068><s%> stirred up <S%H5782><s%> <S%H8689><s%> the spirit <S%H7307><s%> of Cyrus <S%H3566><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Persia <S%H6539><s%>, that he made a proclamation <S%H5674><s%> <S%H8686><s%> <S%H6963><s%> throughout all his kingdom <S%H4438><s%>, and put it also in writing <S%H4385><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%> <S%H8800><s%>,

Thus saith <S%H559><s%> <S%H8804><s%> Cyrus <S%H3566><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Persia <S%H6539><s%>, The YY <S%H3068><s%> 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> of heaven <S%H8064><s%> hath given <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8804><s%> me all the kingdoms <S%H4467><s%> of the earth <S%H776><s%>; and he hath charged <S%H6485><s%> <S%H8804><s%> me to build <S%H1129><s%> <S%H8800><s%> him an house <S%H1004><s%> at Yerushalayim <S%H3389><s%>, which is in Y'hudah <S%H3063><s%>.

Who is there among you of all his people <S%H5971><s%>? His 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> be with him, and let him go up <S%H5927><s%> <S%H8799><s%> to Yerushalayim <S%H3389><s%>, which is in Y'hudah <S%H3063><s%>, and build <S%H1129><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the house <S%H1004><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%> 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>, (he <S%H1931><s%> is the 'Elohim <S%H430><s%>,) which is in Yerushalayim <S%H3389><s%>.

And whosoever remaineth <S%H7604><s%> <S%H8737><s%> in any place <S%H4725><s%> where he sojourneth <S%H1481><s%> <S%H8802><s%>, let the men <S%H582><s%> of his place <S%H4725><s%> help <S%H5375><s%> <S%H8762><s%> him with silver <S%H3701><s%>, and with gold <S%H2091><s%>, and with goods <S%H7399><s%>, and with beasts <S%H929><s%>, beside the freewill offering <S%H5071><s%> for the house <S%H1004><s%> of 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> that is in Yerushalayim <S%H3389><s%>.

Then rose up <S%H6965><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the chief <S%H7218><s%> of the fathers <S%H1><s%> of Y'hudah <S%H3063><s%> and Binyamin <S%H1144><s%>, and the Kohanim <S%H3548><s%>, and the L'vi'im <S%H3881><s%>, with all them whose spirit <S%H7307><s%> 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> had raised <S%H5782><s%> <S%H8689><s%>, to go up <S%H5927><s%> <S%H8800><s%> to build <S%H1129><s%> <S%H8800><s%> the house <S%H1004><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%> which is in Yerushalayim <S%H3389><s%>.

And all they that were about <S%H5439><s%> them strengthened <S%H2388><s%> <S%H8765><s%> their hands <S%H3027><s%> with vessels <S%H3627><s%> of silver <S%H3701><s%>, with gold <S%H2091><s%>, with goods <S%H7399><s%>, and with beasts <S%H929><s%>, and with precious things <S%H4030><s%>, beside all that was willingly offered <S%H5068><s%> <S%H8692><s%>.

Also Cyrus <S%H3566><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> brought forth <S%H3318><s%> <S%H8689><s%> the vessels <S%H3627><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%>, which Nebuchadnezzar <S%H5019><s%> had brought forth <S%H3318><s%> <S%H8689><s%> out of Yerushalayim <S%H3389><s%>, and had put <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8799><s%> them in the house <S%H1004><s%> of his 'elohim <S%H430><s%>;

Havahn those did Cyrus <S%H3566><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Persia <S%H6539><s%> bring forth <S%H3318><s%> <S%H8686><s%> by the hand <S%H3027><s%> of Mithredath <S%H4990><s%> the treasurer <S%H1489><s%>, and numbered <S%H5608><s%> <S%H8799><s%> them unto Sheshbazzar <S%H8339><s%>, the prince <S%H5387><s%> of Y'hudah <S%H3063><s%>.

And this is the number <S%H4557><s%> of them: thirty <S%H7970><s%> chargers <S%H105><s%> of gold <S%H2091><s%>, a thousand <S%H505><s%> chargers <S%H105><s%> of silver <S%H3701><s%>, nine <S%H8672><s%> and twenty <S%H6242><s%> knives <S%H4252><s%>,

Thirty <S%H7970><s%> basons <S%H3713><s%> of gold <S%H2091><s%>, silver <S%H3701><s%> basons <S%H3713><s%> of a second <S%H4932><s%> sort four <S%H702><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> and ten <S%H6235><s%>, and other <S%H312><s%> vessels <S%H3627><s%> a thousand <S%H505><s%>.

All the vessels <S%H3627><s%> of gold <S%H2091><s%> and of silver <S%H3701><s%> were five <S%H2568><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> and four <S%H702><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%>. All these did Sheshbazzar <S%H8339><s%> bring up <S%H5927><s%> <S%H8689><s%> with them of the captivity <S%H1473><s%> that were brought up <S%H5927><s%> <S%H8736><s%> from Babylon <S%H894><s%> unto Yerushalayim <S%H3389><s%>.
